documents.document: @terriemiddlemas Sounds like the lad wants a g/f in name only, with none of the commitment😳 #In for a penny In for a £ Is how it should be☺
@ALS_Fanzine Still among the poorest excuses for a footballer ever to pull on an #SAFC shirt...one Ball/Catts-style tackle changes nowt😳
@EmmaMcfc93x Ditto. Been feeling crappy and listless for 3 days now 😳☹
@safcianpeterlee 5 points with 15 games to go....more than 'recoverable'....even for Sunderland....can't see it happening this time though☹
@WiseMenSayPod #SAFC-hater Matt Le Tissier thought it was a red....but he would say that 😂
@safcianpeterlee Can't think of anything more depressing than a David Moyes press conference.... 😉
@Iamrol The lad that won has my surname (different spelling), got 5 correct scores, the only one he got wrong was Sunderland! 😳 #Super 6
@kieronellis_21 Don't know what to make of it tbh Didn't see that one coming at all 😳
@marathon_mick69 And that sole, 'token' substitution, did nowt to alleviate my totally-pissed-off-at-Moyes mood 😒 #Safc
Pretty sure Graham Taylor will be 'looking down' with that trademark smile tonight and a cry of "Do I like that!" 😂😂 #Arsenal 1 Watford 2
@DavidNunn73 It's way beyond "worrying", David....any slim chances of a SIXTH successive 'escape' have now been firmly extinguished 😳😒 #Safc
@kevinoneillmitt Exactly. And the chances of signing an "affordable" forward (of the quality needed) who also happens to be a free agent? ☹
@Sunderland1879 "Rodwell" and "superb" in the same sentence??!! 😳😂 #Oh, come on!!
Moyes is officially a tit. "Ulloa or no one"😳😈 Apparently he didn't want to go "further down the list" of his striker targets😒 #FFS
@safcking You're right, it's not enough (unfortunately)....given that Palace & Swansea both won😒😒 But it's still a point no one expected😂
Swansea & Palace both winning 😒😒 #FFS
@fannewssafc the VERY best ☹ #but so far, so good 👍 #ha'way the lads 😊
@OrwiteTreacle But shocking refereeing decisions are ten-a-penny every fecking week😳 Are they therefore even worth mentioning😂
@OrwiteTreacle So I heard....but Lee Mason (just a YARD away?) inexplicably failed to do us a favour and send the useless cunt off 😳😂
@Ridderz86 No fan more 'bereft' than me about Borini 😳☹
Ahh fuck....Le Tissier covering our match on Gillette soccer special on #ssnhq 😳😠
@SunderlandAFC Let's just try to keep the score respectable tonight, lads 👍 #had our bellyful of embarrassments & humiliations
Just seen the team....Fraudwell in starting 11 😳 #FFS 😒 #Safc
@leemcm1976 Hard game for Boro, maybe, but not compared to ours.... 😓😉 #SAFC #Ha'way The Lads
@Ridderz86 calibre, surely means the death knell is now tolling at the SOL😳☹ Doubtful those 'voids' can be filled via #free agents
@Ridderz86 Failing to bring in some pace, plus a big man up top to compensate for Vic's enforced absence, AND a cb of, say, Jagielka's
@ChloeStrattonxo Not going myself. Could've used my mam's season card but didn't take up offer #Will know soon enough if right decision 😉
@PawleySteven ZILCH happening, mate 😳☹ Be interesting to see what tonight's attendance is? #crazy fixture scheduling 😒
@ALS_Fanzine Moyes spins the Wheel of Fortune....and yet again it stops at Everton 😳😂 #Sunder-ton
@KevinMackevtra That simple & sensible philosophy has proved to be beyond the comprehension of a succession of Sunderland managers....😳😈😒
@SkySports_Keith Great news 😂 But NOT the time we've wasted pursuing this player 😳😒
@ALS_Fanzine NO 😳😳 (not even HALF that) #move on
@1973anth03 Think we'd be paying way more than just a couple mil over the odds😳 #not worth it with Ulloa imo #need to look elsewhere
@safcking Now THAT'S a way more attractive proposition 😂 #Leicester, they (continue to...hopefully!) say 'NO' 😂
@jimmy_chop @dpcoverdale Championship team, would be invaluable to them and ultimately beneficial to #SAFC (especially if we're relegated?)
@jimmy_chop @dpcoverdale would only be counter productive. BUT, the 'experience' they'd gain by going out on loan to say a mid-table
@jimmy_chop @dpcoverdale I agree....players from the U23s should only be 'blooded' when the team is winning games & doing well. Doing so now
@nightmar3s23 @SkySports_Keith bloody hope so 😳
@SkySports_Keith Hope that 'light' stays RED until 11 o'clock tonight 😳
@SunderlandEcho @SunderlandAFC FFS!!! 😳😒 #MOVE ON
@donjuan72FTM love a "double negative" on TDD 😂 think your probs right, though ☹
@roker_71 Wish you could have a whole year of them ☺ x
@safcianpeterlee You forgot 'scouse- turned-geordie' in between the words 'fat' and 'bastard'😂 And you missed off 'who ate all the pies'😂
@dpcoverdale Which is crazy, when Moyes pretty much refuses point blank to put any of them on the pitch in a first team game😳
@dpcoverdale Please God, let it be Jack Rodwell 😂
@Safc1879_ @MaxHanaghan Think you're probably right on both counts😳 Although paying over the odds for any player is still hard to accept☹
@MaxHanaghan Exactly 😳☹
@JHunterChron Pity....Moyes could have had an "embarrassment of riches" to choose from tomorrow night! 😂 #Safc
@SkySports_Keith Then we've paid over the odds for them....sadly the norm nowadays, but we shouldn't complain after getting £14m for pva😁
@DavidNunn73 But has Ulloa proved he can replicate his Championship goalscoring feats in the PL? Above £3 mil has to be a "no-go" imo 😳
@kevinoneillmitt @TheMightyNews and they've NO chance of getting that, imo
@leemcm1976 So I heard. All of this is the last thing Boro need when you're only a few points above the bottom three....
@DavidNunn73 Go elsewhere....despite the 'imperativeness'
@leemcm1976 Totally. Can't be having a manager slagging off the fans....that's a line u just don't cross 😳
@NDJ0602 Anything above THREE mil for Ulloa would be daylight robbery 😳
@JHunterChron Hopefully back for Southampton game, then #Pickford #Safc
@leemcm1976 That is one very pissed-off manager😳 Sounds like Karanka himself may want out ?
@Ridderz86 @JohnnyR1Red He takes that 'dour' reputation bestowed on many Scots ⚽ managers past & present to a whole new level imo
@Ridderz86 @marco_ten Id put Flo on the list of players who, for multitudinous reasons, we should never, ever, have even attempted to sign😳
@Ridderz86 @marco_ten I remember Bellion, of course, but no1 could touch Gabbiadini for pace 😂 #blistering
MVG is a like a fuckin MACHINE, a flawless ROBOT 😳😳 #Masters 🎯 champion-in waiting
@kevinoneillmitt @MaxHanaghan @welderboy34 honestly believe relegation now would be a disaster on a par with 1987 and the old 3rd division😳
@daveg_safc @MaxHanaghan @welderboy34 @kevinoneillmitt In 46 yr Iv never 'accepted' shit in any form, same goes for our numerous relegations
@s26kel Impressive😊👍 In my 'away days' - a mini-lifetime ago, now 😉 - I only beat that total once (equalled it twice) #SAFC
@welderboy34 @kevinoneillmitt Exactly. And those frustration levels are immense 😳☹
@roker_71 The Power's match had (just) finished when I got in from taking my boy home to his mam☹ ❤ a bit of the darts #The Masters 🎯 #itv4
@OrwiteTreacle @podmundo @leon_flint @Mattyosafc We did with Phillips/Quinn and a decade earlier Gabbiadini/Gates😂 Suppose we could again...
@welderboy34 I agree mate. God, it's depressing, isn't it ☹ #that's Sunderland all over
@OrwiteTreacle @podmundo @leon_flint @Mattyosafc We'd be "bashing our bishops" every week 😂😂
@Mattyosafc Minimum of FOUR signings needed but doubt we'll make even one😳 Moyes fuckin well & truly shafted any miniscule chance we had😒
Ulloa😳 FFS Sunderland😳 You can't be serious😳 #enough said
Referee Martin Atkinson not exactly covering himself in glory today 😳 #shocking #useless wanker #Milwall v Watford #FA Cup🏆 #bbc1
@terriemiddlemas If you were awake before 8:30 on a Sunday morning, do u need one? 😉😂
@MaxHanaghan Iv noticed that😆 HATE double-barrelled names at best of times😳 #naff #pretentious #and totally incongruous with ⚽😳
@leemcm1976 Former Sunderland loan player too (during his 1st Boro spell)...and the goal ironically set up by ex-SAFC mf Grant Leadbitter 😊
@marathon_mick69 a pretty forlorn hope, I think, Mick ☹ #Safc
@jayne__90 Two out of three ain't bad, Jayne 😉😂😂
@azysafc That's now TWELVE 'away' FA🏆 ties without a win for the geordies 😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂 #FTM
@EddyBlackadder One so cunning, you could put a tail on it and call it a weasel 😂
"players in"....thanks to the monstrosity that is FFP we can't do the latter without selling at least one, probably 2, players 😳😒
Paul Merson😂😂 "criminal" his opinion of SAFC decision to sell pva...then virtually in next breath he states the bloody obvious that we need
@ChloeStrattonxo Actually there ARE some very cute pics of me from back then😂 Something clearly gone horribly wrong in the years since😉
@ChloeStrattonxo How cute r u?! 😉😃 #wish I could say same of pics of me as a bairn😂
@MaxHanaghan So iv just discovered😳 Still, even 10m would be huge profit of 8.5m and surely we could never have expected that on pva!😂
@ChloeStrattonxo Isn't it just 😂 and trying to explain to my boy why Sunderland aren't playing today is a small price to pay for that 😂
@9December1892 @ALS_Fanzine 1996? No, as recently as 2009, actually....Mags n Smoggies were BOTH relegated while we stayed up😂😂😂
@SAFCliveupdates Oviedo then, please
@FootsySAFC Don't know about clubs and chatting up girls...pub(s), pool, and an Indian were my staple Friday night 'recipe' for 20+ yr 😂😂😂
@safc_lex Seriously doubt the fee will be anything like £14m but it'd be a refreshing change for #Safc to do OUTSTANDING business on a sale😂
@thecentretunnel (2/2) shirts; and the most 😫 boring 🏆Final in the rich history of England's (sporting) 'Twin Towers'😳☹ #joy unbounded #not
@thecentretunnel Crap team; a should've-been-stoned-to-death chairman whose name was narcissistically emblazoned across the players' (1/2)
@MaxHanaghan Shocking decision from Clattenburg 😳
@FootsySAFC Doubtless that's true😳 And yet instead of Darren Bent the "legend" he will be remembered in Sunderland as Darren J. Iscariot😂
@TarquinSmythe73 Yeah...am now wanting them to preserve or extend this 2-1 lead 😉
McClaren's 'brolly' has been noticeable by its absence in the rain at Pride Park tonight 😂 #lessons of past ridicule learned? #dcfc #lcfc
@TarquinSmythe73 Yeah, they'll finish above at least 5 other teams I reckon mate
@TarquinSmythe73 We may appear to be, but we've been here so often I'm taking nowt as a given #still time if not much in way of genuine hope
@TarquinSmythe73 have 'distraction' of the 🏆 for as long as poss in hope it has adverse effect on their league form/benefits us
@TarquinSmythe73 Not sure about that. Those teams around/close to SAFC in PL who like us are in a relegation battle Id prefer them to have
@Parkersafc Id be first in the queue! 😂 Wish we WOULD make a bid for Gabbiadini, just for the hell of it 😂
